org.lwjgl

Class BufferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.BufferUtils

  • public final class BufferUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Some often-used Buffer code for creating native buffers of the appropriate size.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Id$
    Author:
    $Author$
